titulo: Dream Big, Little Sofi: Sofi Goes for a Ride [Spanish Edition]
descripcion:
If you are looking for a great new way to immerse your toddler in a foreign language, you just found it! Our audiobook series! All of our books are designed with infants and toddlers in mind, providing plenty of entertainment and helping young children better focus their attention. All of our books are highly interactive, providing great fun for your child. You can make sure your child is hearing and learning the right pronunciation each time. And our great interactive narration and added sound effects guarantee hours and hours of listening and learning fun for your little one! 
Through sound effects, our books are continuously engaging your child's attention and interest in the story. New words are introduced by a young, sweet character that your child can identify with. We are certain that your child will enjoy countless hours of foreign language fun with our audiobooks, and you can jump-start your family's interest in immersing your little one in a foreign language. Now is the perfect time to do it!
